Organize a Festival
Organize a Festival
Tension is high in [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], you are to plan a festival to placate the people.
\nThe mission will begin in a month.\n

Greetings [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

There will always be discontented commoners in [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for one reason or another, but nothing calms the populace like a palliative distraction. I want you to organize a festival to entertain and placate the masses. Make it a great success that glorifies the realm. I will leave the details to you.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetBestName]
As with all large events, the location is essential to its success. A location that borders discontent provinces would have the most impact.
I will hold the festival in [province_1.GetName].
Prepare to set out for [province_2.GetName].
Why not shore up support at home?
As you plan out the various festivities, you realize that if you really want to make the event a success you will have to spend your own wealth.
I shall spare no expense in bringing joy to the people!
A modest sum should be enough.
They're only peasants, they don't need much.

The day of the festival begins with a procession in full pomp and ceremony dedicated to the majesty of [Root.TopLiege.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]. As the [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle]'s official representative you take up the lead immediately followed by other dignitaries, [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s and local notables. However, it is the entertainments of the fair that the common folk of [mission_province.GetName] have really come to see. As the procession comes to a close,you decide to take a look around for yourself.
This should be interesting.

As you walk around the fair, you begin to hear the roar of an angry crowd. Upon arriving at the source of the commotion, you discover that a brawl has broken out between rival members of two local factions. Enraged peasants are attacking everything and everyone in sight. Someone has even managed to start a fire!
Guards!!!
Now now, let's all calm down.
Stop this madness in the name of the [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle]!

The festival has been a joyous occasion for the people of [mission_province.GetName], with superb entertainment and much singing and dancing in the local fashion. Alas,all good things must come to an end. Everyone leaves in high spirits, having forgetten their worries for a while.
A well deserved respite.
[mission_province.GetName] and up to two provinces away will have reduced revolt risk.
[mission_province.GetName] and its neighboring provinces will have reduced revolt risk.
The festival is over, and it was clearly not a success. The people leave wondering why they even bothered attending such a travesty.
Damned ingrates.

Heresy must be exorcised utterly or it will return all the stronger, time and time again, until it is too great to destroy.

Infiltrate Court
You have been tasked with establishing an agent at $TARGET$'s court.
\nThe mission will begin in a month.\n

Greetings [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I have been using one of your trusted courtiers to pass bad information to [infiltrate_court_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for several months, and an opportunity has arisen to place this "traitor" with [infiltrate_court_target.GetBestName] and [infiltrate_court_target.GetHersHis] court. I would like you to travel together to pledge your services - with my blessing - and return here to take your place as the [infiltrate_court_target.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] "agent". All is in readiness. I expect you to play your part in this mission for the good of the realm, but do not forget who is your true liege.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetBestName]

The time has come for you to visit [infiltrate_court_target.GetTitledName]'s court. You set off in disguise with your fellow agent. Even if no-one is watching, on this mission appearances are everything.
Onwards...

You have arrived at [From.GetTitledName]'s court. It seems you are expected - after a few words with your colleague, a retainer ushers you quietly into a small side chamber. You are soon joined by [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]. "I had been told to expect you", [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Our mutual friend here - my new court informant - has told me you have suffered great wrongs at the hands of your [Root.TopLiege.GetMasterMistress] and can be trusted, but remain well connected in the [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] court. Can I count on you to serve me?"
Yes, [From.GetTitledFirstName]. We share common enemies - let them tremble.
Of course. This could be a most profitable agreement.

[infiltrate_court_target.GetBestName] regards you for a moment then smiles. "Good. Then let us get down to business." The three of you speak together for some time on the "secret" matters on which you were briefed - most of it fabricated nonsense, of course - before the [infiltrate_court_target.GetTitle] bids you eat and rest a while, and shows you and your courtier to secluded but comfortable accommodation. You share a conspiratorial wink as you make yourselves comfortable.

[infiltrate_court_target.GetBestName] regards you for a moment then laughs. "I should cut off your head, but I would rather you return home and tell your [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle] of your failure - and thank [Root.TopLiege.GetHerHim] for alerting me to spies by sending such an obvious fool." [infiltrate_court_target.GetHerHisCap] face then turns serious. "And if I ever find either of you in my domains again your heads will be the last things I cut off." You both leave...very quickly.
My work here is done.
How humiliating!

Everything has been prepared. You leave [infiltrate_court_target.GetBestName] contented and none the wiser to the new mole in [infiltrate_court_target.GetHersHis] court - who remains loyal to both you and your liege. As you begin your journey back to [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], you congratulate yourself on a mission well done.
Excellent
